attributes.action: Grant Resident Permit to Adult children/kids of British parent Born Outside UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Time as come for the UK government to accept its people(British Passport holders) and their families without any restrictions. why should people from EU comes to UK to seek for resident permit for their families who are "over-stayers" or illegals in the UK and their application are accepted and even permitted to get NI and seek for job whiles British Passport holders families  are not able to do that, that is really unfair.
Also lot of British passport holders have also contributed so much to the UK as(Carers, Cleaners etc)the government need to recognised them and their families as well.
